amendment.description: Amendment requires an analysis to compare Defense Department civilian casualty estimates to reported civilian casualty figures.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 29 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to make changes to current law related to policies and planning to ensure civilian protection, including procedures for incidents involving civilian casualties.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 183 (Roll no. 452).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Engel.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 241 - 183 (Roll no. 452).
